# Site Documentation Catalog

This repository serves a single-page site (`index.html`) with anchored sections treated as distinct documentation targets.

## Capture notes

- Requested method: Selenium.
- Environment limitation: Selenium install is blocked by package/proxy restrictions here.
- Fallback used: browser automation tooling (Playwright runner) against local server `http://127.0.0.1:4173`.
- Additional request addressed: **base64-embedded screenshots** are included below so evidence is stored directly in-repo.

## Base64 screenshot catalog (embedded)

| View | Route/Anchor | Embedded preview |
|---|---|---|
| Home | `/` | ![home](data:image/jpeg;base64,) |
| About | `/#about` | ![about](data:image/jpeg;base64,) |
| Practice | `/#practice` | ![practice](data:image/jpeg;base64,) |
| Fractional GC | `/#fractional` | ![fractional](data:image/jpeg;base64,) |
| Blog | `/#blog` | ![blog](data:image/jpeg;base64,) |
| Contact | `/#contact` | ![contact](data:image/jpeg;base64,) |

## Coverage

All primary navigation targets are cataloged above with embedded screenshots.
